meta.title: python ModuleNotFoundError をまとめて直す（権限/環境/手順）
meta.desc: 直近1ヶ月の投稿（10〜20件）を元に、原因パターン→チェックリスト→具体手順→FAQまで1ページに整理。

references.label: npm docs (config/prefix)
GitHub REST API (search issues)
StackExchange API

github: P1: Implement OllamaAdapter for NSIL LocalRuntimeAdapter contract
github: P1: Implement VLLMAdapter capability contract with optional-dependency fallbacks
github: P1: Compile gate contracts into deterministic PolicyGrammar outputs (GBNF/regex/explanation)

github: P1: Build NSIL action propose→verify core with deterministic violation codes
github: P2: Add nsil_verify_action MCP tool with repair suggestions and stable response schema
github: P2: Add NSIL training example schema + deterministic artifact extractors
github: P2: Add reward/curriculum policy and nsil_extract_training_data MCP JSONL export
github: P2: Build NSIL eval harness baseline (Tier0/Tier1) with deterministic metrics table
github: P2: Add Tier2/Tier3 benchmark runners and nsil_benchmark MCP tool

items.title: [Bug]: Installation failed due to Stability-AI upstream repository return 404 (Error 128)
items.summary: 症状/環境が近い投稿。エラー文と権限・prefix・PATHが焦点になりやすい。
items.reply_draft:
I feel you — this kind of error is usually about permissions / install location / PATH / caches.
I summarized a step-by-step checklist (with common mistakes + fixes) here: https://mikann20041029.github.io/solve-multi-python-modulenotfounderror-202602260102/
If you can share OS + Node/npm versions and the exact command, it's easier to pinpoint.
